description: A piece of clothing for the upper body with sleeves.
Sturdy pants made of denim fabric, often blue.
A tube or cone-shaped garment hanging from the waist.
A short coat typically extending below the hips.
Casual shoes with a soft rubber sole.
A loose-fitting upper garment, especially for women.
A knitted sweater fastening down the front.
Tight-fitting stretchy pants, often worn by women.
A piece of fabric worn around the neck for warmth.
A round, flat cap made of soft material.
A long, waterproof coat with a belt.
Wide-legged pants that look like a skirt.
A heavy, double-breasted coat, often navy-colored.
A loose-fitting undergarment for the upper body.
A one-piece form-fitting garment that covers the torso.
A hat with a soft brim and indented crown.
Hand coverings with separate sheaths for each finger.
A blanket-like cloak with an opening for the head.
Close-fitting, elastic garments covering the foot and leg.
A formal suit for men, typically black.
A long, wide-sleeved traditional Japanese robe.
Garments covering the body from the chest down, usually with straps.
A long cloth wrapped around the head.
Soft leather slip-on shoes.
A tight-fitting undergarment to shape the torso.
